hero.title: Practical Solutions For your Problems
hero.subTitle: High quality orthopaedic sports injury & joint reconstruction clinic

introduction.title: International Orthopaedic Clinic
introduction.description: Darshan Memorial  was established to provide expertise in Orthopaedic surgery to the local and expatriate community in India and to the international community. From his experiences training and working in Ludhiana, Kuruksheta and Muktsar, Dr Ishan believes that communication and empathy is vital for patients no matter the background. Dr Ishan enjoys understanding the patient’s needs, providing realistic expectations and practical solutions for their problems.

diseases.description: The doctors of the hospital specializes in areas related to bones, testing, Covid support, Plastic Surgery, Baby delivery, Sports Injuries and Tissue Reconstruction. They performs Robotic Surgery, and manages General Adult and Paediatric Trauma, and Musculoskeletal Tumours.

doctor1.name: Dr. Ishan Bhateja
doctor1.description: Dr. Ishaan is one of the most prominent doctor in the region. He has 5 years of experience in dealing with C-Section deliveries, trauma(fracture) and joint ache related issue.He expertise has helped many get relieved from their ailments and ortho related pains.

doctor2.name: Dr. Natalie Bhateja
doctor2.description: Dr. Natalie is one of the most prominent doctor in the region. He has 5 years of experience in dealing with C-Section deliveries, trauma(fracture) and joint ache related issue.He expertise has helped many get relieved from their ailments and ortho related pains.

testimonial1.feedback: I got the best treatment ever. Highly recommend. Dr. Shayam treated my long lasting back pain.
testimonial1.name: Shyam Singh

testimonial2.feedback: Dr. Natalie treaded my wife. Infact I will name my new born daughters Natalie Prasad.
testimonial2.name: Hari Prasad

footer.sundayMessage: Closed on Sundays and Public Holidays

orthopedist.name: Dr. Ishan Bhateja
orthopedist.description: Dr. Ishan is a renowned Ortho in the Muktsar community. He did his M.B.B.S from Firozpur and M.D from Ludhiana. Being a young gun, Dr. Ishan is well versed with the advanced surgery techniques.

obstetrician.name: Dr. Natalie Bhateja
obstetrician.description: Dr. Natalie is a renowned Obstetrician in the Muktsar community. She did his M.B.B.S from Firozpur and M.D from Ludhiana. She provides utmost care for the young woman.

gallery.header: A Glimpse of a Normal Day at the Hospital
gallery.description: We at Darshan Memorial provides world class treatment along with wide array of services. Here are few of the pictures that showcase how much we care for our Patients.

nurses.title: Nurses
nurses.description: Working to make things ready before the Doctor arrives for his scheduled Surgery.

icu.title: ICU
icu.description: Intensive Care room with deluxe services including Ventilators and Air Conditioning.

waitingHall.title: Waiting Hall
waitingHall.description: Waiting area for family and relatives. Ecofriendly area with Air Conditioning.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Private parking along wit Ambulance services.

physiotherapy.title: Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.description: Customized Physiotherapy sessions for fast recovery.

commonRoom.title: Common Room
commonRoom.description: A common patient recovery room that fits every budget.

shoulder.tendinopathies: Tendinopathies of the wrist and elbow

facility1.name: Physiotherapy
facility1.description: We provide world class Physiotherapy with. We derive immense pride and reputation owing to the fact that we provide the humanistic and cost effective healthcare to our patients.

facility2.name: X-Ray
facility2.description: We have a latest highly capable X-Ray machine that shows skeleton system in high resolution.

facility3.name: Ventilator
facility3.description: We also have ventilator to provide care for high risk patients.

laboratory.description: Right Diagnosis and early recognition of the disease helps not on in Curing the disease before it causes damage but also helps in preventing underlying condition whose symptoms are yet to be visible. Our Laboratory provides wide array of testing services.

delivery.description: Keeping in view that women in general prefer to be treated by an obstetrician-gynecologist (OB-GYN). We provide all the necessary services that include delivery, Cesarean surgery and child care services.

surgery.description: All types of surgeries are done here.
